comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: The weekly bonus can be in the form of a balance credited to the account. the amount certainly won't be too big, but enough to make the player continue the game. I think members who are entitled to receive a weekly bonus must meet certain conditions, such as being devoted to certain games.and the monthly bonus, in my opinion, will be better suited to the percentage of the volume of bets made. This of course will require a certain rating or standard from the team. like the top 10 players with the biggest winning percentage. or total bets made in a monthly period.Several casinos have implemented a monthly bonus for members who meet the criteria. this is a great way. if your casino will implement it, you only need to modify its implementation.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: A lot of people on this forum seemingly gamble with the main objective being to get these sorts of bonuses, so I imagine the more frequent the bonuses, the more members will be trying to earn them.Â  So long as it's profitable and you have the free development time to continue offering special events, it seems like a win-win for everyone.Â  I think people must actually enjoy chasing the bonuses, like a sort of game, otherwise they wouldn't be so popular.Â  So if it's making people money and everyone is having fun, why not toss as many out there as you have time to?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: Punt.com on January 01, 2023, 03:31:23 AMWe would love to hear feedback from all bitcointalk members! A genuine gambler will not look for bonus or any sorts of promotions. They will only look for the limit they have. If you have higher limit and allow them to stake high then you will find many gamblers registering with you. But consider that you have enough bankroll to pay the winners when they win big. For new registrations, if you have registration bonus like 150% of deposit or 200% of deposit with some wagering requirement, then anyone will like it. However don't make it like maximum $100 or $200 LOL. Deposit x and get x bonus without any higher cap. Have a decent wagering requirement to project your business. If I was a gambling company owner then I would focus on deposit bonus more than anything else.

comments.author: jackg
comments.body: You could also offer rewards based on how active people are on your site in placing bets. You can either do this as more of a wagering*number of bets or just a number of bets over a certain amount of satoshi giving you a ticket to enter a prize draw for a jackpot (for example you could make it one ticket per 100 wagers over 1000 satoshi at 2x odds or higher).
